metadata.description: Front-end developer passionate about creating engaging, easy-to-use web experiences.

about.description:
I'm a front-end developer with 3 years of experience creating modern, responsive interfaces that really work for people. 
Mastering React, Next.js and Flutter, I have been transforming ideas into lightweight, accessible and visually attractive digital products, both for web and mobile.
